00053 void CHTMLEntryDisplay::updateSettings(void){
00054   m_highlightedVerseColorName = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::highlightedVerseColor).name();
00055     m_standardFontColorName         = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::textColor).name();
00056     m_swordRefColorName                 = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::swordRefColor).name();
00057 
00058   m_standardFontName = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::standard).family();
00059   m_standardFontSize = /*CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize*/(CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::standard).pointSize() );
00060 
00061     m_unicodeFontName  = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).family();
00062   m_unicodeFontSize  = /*CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize*/( CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).pointSize() );
00063 
00064     m_htmlHeader = header();
00065 
00066 }
00067 
00069 char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display(CSwordModuleInfo* module) {
00070     if (!module) {
00071         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00072         return -1;
00073     }
00074   //refresh font settings
00075     updateSettings();
00076     
00077     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(module) );
00078     if (!key) {
00079         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00080         return 0;
00081     }   
00082     key->key( module->module()->KeyText() );
00083     
00084     CReferenceManager::Type refType = CReferenceManager::Unknown;
00085     if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible)
00086         refType = CReferenceManager::Bible;
00087     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary)
00088         refType = CReferenceManager::Commentary;
00089     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon)
00090         refType = CReferenceManager::Lexicon;
00091     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook)
00092         refType = CReferenceManager::GenericBook;
00093     
00094     if (m_includeHeader) {
00095         m_htmlText = m_htmlHeader;
00096 
00097     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<body>%1: <span id=\"highlighted\"><A HREF=\"%2\">%3</A></span><BR>")
00098       .arg(module->config(CSwordModuleInfo::Description))
00099             .arg(CReferenceManager::encodeHyperlink(module->name(),key->key(), refType))
00100       .arg(key->key());
00101 
00102         m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<span %1>%1</span>")
00103       .arg(module->isUnicode() ? "id=\"unicodetext\"" : "")
00104 //      .arg( module->isUnicode() ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00105 //          .arg( module->isUnicode() ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize)
00106       .arg( key->renderedText() );
00107 
00108     m_htmlText += "</body></html>";
00109     }
00110     else {
00111         m_htmlText = key->renderedText();
00112     }
00113 
00114     return 1;
00115 }
00116 
00118 char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display( QPtrList<CSwordModuleInfo>* moduleList) {
00119 //  qDebug("CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display( QList<CSwordModuleInfo>* moduleList)");
00120     if (!moduleList || (moduleList && !moduleList->count()) ) {
00121         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00122         return 0;
00123     }
00124     //reload font settings
00125     updateSettings();
00126 
00127     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(moduleList->first()) );
00128         
00129     SWModule* module = moduleList->first()->module();
00130 //  ASSERT(module);
00131     QString usedKey = QString::null;
00132     CSwordModuleInfo *d = 0;    
00133     
00134     SWModule *m= (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;
00135     SWKey* sw = (SWKey*)(*module);
00136     key->key(*sw);  
00137     usedKey = key->key();
00138     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;    
00139     while (m) {
00140     m = (d=moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;
00141     if (m) {
00142             m->SetKey( (const char*)usedKey.local8Bit() );
00143         d->snap();          
00144         }
00145     }   
00146 
00147     const int width=(int)((double)100/(double)moduleList->count());
00148     m_htmlText = m_htmlHeader + QString::fromLatin1("<TABLE cellpadding=\"2\" cellspacing=\"0\"><TR>");     
00149     m_htmlText.append(QString("<font face=\"%1\" size=\"%2\" color=\"%3\">")
00150         .arg(m_standardFontName).arg(m_standardFontSize).arg(m_standardFontColorName));
00151     
00152     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;        
00153     while (m) {
00154         key->module(d);
00155     if (m){
00156         m_htmlText.append(QString("<td width=\"%1\" bgcolor=\"#f1f1f1\"><b>%2 ")
00157                 .arg(width).arg(d->name()));
00158             m_htmlText.append(QString("(<font color=\"%1\" face=\"%2\" size=\"%3\">%4</font>)</b></td>")
00159                 .arg(m_highlightedVerseColorName)
00160         .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00161             .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize)
00162             .arg(key->key())
00163             );
00164         }
00165         m = (d=moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;           
00166     }
00167     m_htmlText.append(QString::fromLatin1("</TR>"));
00168             
00169     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;
00170     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<TR>");
00171     while (m) {
00172         key->module(d);
00173         key->key(usedKey);
00174         
00175         m_htmlText +=
00176             QString::fromLatin1("<td width=\"%1%\"><FONT face =\"%2\" size=\"%3\">%4</font></td>")
00177                 .arg(width)
00178                 .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00179                 .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize)
00180                 .arg(key->renderedText());
00181         m = (d = moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;     
00182     }
00183     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("</font></tr></table></body></html>");
00184 
00185     //clean up
00186 //  delete key; 
00187     return 1;
00188 }

00191 const QString& CHTMLEntryDisplay::header(){
00192   m_htmlHeader = QString::fromLatin1("<HTML><HEAD>\n");
00193 
00194   m_htmlHeader += QString::fromLatin1("\n<style type=\"text/css\">\n\n");
00195 
00196   for (int t = MinType; t <= MaxType; ++t) {
00197     m_htmlHeader += "\t" + formatString(static_cast<CHTMLEntryDisplay::StyleType>(t)) + "\n\n";
00198   }
00199   m_htmlHeader += QString::fromLatin1("</style>\n\n");
00200 
00201 // #unicodetext { font-family: !unicodefamily!; }\n\
00202 // #highlighted { color: !highlightedcolor!; }\n\
00203 // #reference { color: !refcolor!; font-decoration: none; }\n\
00204 // #jesuswords {color: !jesuswordscolor!; text-weight:bolder;}\n\
00205 // #otquote {font-size: smaller;}\n\
00206 // #poetry  {font-weight: light; text-align: justify;}\n\
00207 // #sectionhead  {font-size: larger; font-weight: bold; color: !textcolor!;}\n\
00208 // #booktitle  {font-weight: x-bold; font-size: x-large; color: !textcolor!; margin-top:1mm;margin-bottom:1mm;}\n\
00209 // #strongnumber  {font-decoration: none; font-size: smaller; font-weight:lighter; font-style:italic; color: !strongscolor!;}\n\
00210 // #morphcode  {font-size: smaller; color: !morphcolor!; font-decoration:none;}\n\
00211 // #footnote  {font-size: smaller; color: !footnotecolor!; font-style:italic;}\n\
00212 // #footnotepre {font-weight: bolder;}\n\
00213 
00214   m_htmlHeader += QString::fromLatin1("</HEAD>");
00215   return m_htmlHeader;
00216 }

00219 const QString CHTMLEntryDisplay::formatString( const CHTMLEntryDisplay::StyleType type){
00220   const QString bgColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::backgroundColor).name();
00221   const QString textColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::textColor).name();
00222   const QString highlightColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::highlightedVerseColor).name();
00223   const QString swordRefColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::swordRefColor).name();
00224   const QString footnotesColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::footnotesColor).name();
00225   const QString morphsColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::morphsColor).name();
00226   const QString strongsColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::strongsColor).name();
00227   const QString jesusWordsColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::jesuswordsColor).name();
00228 //  const QString lemmaColor = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::strongsColor).name();
00229 
00230   QString text;
00231   switch(type) {
00232     case Body:
00233       text =  QString::fromLatin1("body {background-color: %1; color: %2; font-size: %3pt; font-family: %4;}")
00234                 .arg(bgColor)
00235                 .arg(textColor)
00236                 .arg(m_standardFontSize)
00237                 .arg(m_standardFontName);
00238       break;
00239     case Link:
00240       text = QString::fromLatin1("a:link {text-decoration:none; color: %1}").arg(swordRefColor);
00241       break;
00242     case LinkHover:
00243       text = QString::fromLatin1("a:hover {text-decoration:none; font-weight:bolder;}");
00244       break;
00245     case HighlightedText:
00246       text = QString::fromLatin1("#highlighted {color: %1;}")
00247                 .arg(highlightColor);
00248       break;
00249     case UnicodeText:
00250       text = QString::fromLatin1("#unicodetext { font-family: %1; font-size:%2pt; }")
00251                 .arg(m_unicodeFontName)
00252                 .arg(m_unicodeFontSize);
00253       break;
00254     case Reference:
00255       text = QString::fromLatin1("#reference { color: %1; font-decoration: none; }")
00256               .arg(swordRefColor);
00257       break;
00258     case MorphCode:
00259       text = QString::fromLatin1("#morphcode {font-size: smaller; color: %1; font-decoration:none;}")
00260               .arg(morphsColor);
00261       break;
00262     case StrongNumber:
00263       text = QString::fromLatin1("#strongnumber {font-size: smaller; color: %1; font-decoration:none;}")
00264               .arg(strongsColor);
00265       break;
00266     case Lemma:
00267 //      text = QString::fromLatin1("#lemma {font-size: smaller; color: %1; font-decoration:none;}")
00268 //              .arg(lemmaColor);
00269       break;
00270     case Footnote:
00271       text = QString::fromLatin1("#footnote  {font-size: smaller; color: %1; font-style:italic;}")
00272               .arg(footnotesColor);
00273       break;
00274     case FootnotePre:
00275       text = QString::fromLatin1("#footnotepre {font-size: smaller; color: %1; font-weight: bolder;}")
00276               .arg(footnotesColor);
00277       break;
00278     case Poetry:
00279       text = QString::fromLatin1("#poetry {font-weight: lighter; alignment: justify;}");
00280       break;
00281     case Quotation:
00282       text = QString::fromLatin1("#quotation {font-style: italic;}");
00283       break;
00284     case JesusWords:
00285       text = QString::fromLatin1("#jesuswords {font-style: italic; color: %1;}")
00286               .arg(jesusWordsColor);
00287       break;
00288 
00289     case BookTitle:
00290       text = QString::fromLatin1("#booktitle {font-weight: x-bold; font-size: x-large; color: %1; margin-top:1mm; margin-bottom:1mm;}")
00291               .arg(textColor);
00292       break;
00293     case SectionTitle:
00294       text = QString::fromLatin1("#sectiontitle {font-size: larger; font-weight: bold; color: %1;}")
00295               .arg(textColor);
00296       break;
00297     break;
00298   };
00299   return text;
00300 }
